mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (userId, roleId, password, email, telcom, contact, userName) VALUES ( #{userId }, #{roleId }, #{password }, #{email }, #{telcom }, #{contact }, #{userName })
INSERT INTO bar (barName, userId, profileNo, locationNo, barInfo, manager, contact) VALUES ( #{barName }, #{userId }, #{profileNo }, #{locationNo }, #{barInfo }, #{manager }, #{contact })
INSERT INTO band (bandName, userId, profileNo) VALUES ( #{bandName }, #{userId }, #{profileNo })
